articles.description: In addition to identifying a Bitcoin “stockpile,” the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said Do Kwon and Terra artificially restored UST’s dollar peg and misled investors.
articles.content: A complaint filed by the United States Securities and Exchange Commission said Terra co-founder Do Kwon and Terraform Labs laundered more than $100 million worth of Bitcoin from the platform followin… [+3228 chars]
